div.p: This work is supported by the PNRA national Italian project PNRA16_00016, “West Antarctic Ice Sheet History from Slope Processes – Eastern Ross Sea (WHISPERS)” and by the MAE bilateral Italy-US project US16GR04, “Global Sea Level Rise & Antarctic Ice Sheet Stability predictions: guessing future by learning from past(GSLAISS)”. We acknowledge the CMCC Foundation for providing computing resources. This research is a contribution to the SCAR PAIS program (https://www.scar.org/science/pais/).
